Title: Prohibits certain COVID-19 mask and face covering mandates by state agencies
Summary: Prohibits state agencies from promulgating rules, regulations or any form of guidance requiring individuals under the age of eighteen who are not exhibiting COVID-19 related symptoms, as defined by the centers for disease control and prevention, to wear a mask or face covering in a public place or while participating in any recreational or organized sporting activity.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to prohibiting certain COVID-19 mask and face covering mandates by state agencies
